metaTitle: VEGABOL HOMES I Cox | Town Houses €223,000 | 2026
metaDescription: Discover VEGABOL HOMES I in Cox, Alicante. Modern 2-3 bed Town Houses from €223,000. HANSEL LOKAL development completing June 2026. Prime Costa Blanca location.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to VEGABOL HOMES I, an exceptional new residential development by HANSEL LOKAL in the charming town of San Fernando, Cox, Alicante. This carefully planned community offers 2-bedroom and 3-bedroom Town Houses with contemporary design and premium finishes, priced from just €223,000. Located in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after areas, VEGABOL HOMES I combines modern living with the authentic Spanish lifestyle that attracts international buyers worldwide. With completion scheduled for June 1st, 2026, this is your opportunity to invest in a property that offers outstanding value, strategic location near pristine beaches, championship golf courses, and comprehensive local amenities. HANSEL LOKAL brings years of development expertise to ensure quality construction and timely delivery. Whether you're seeking a primary residence, vacation home, or investment property with strong rental potential, VEGABOL HOMES I delivers exceptional value 40% below typical Spanish island markets while offering all the lifestyle benefits Cox is renowned for.

locationSection.intro: San Fernando in Cox, Alicante, represents one of Costa Blanca's most desirable residential destinations. This well-established town combines authentic Spanish charm with modern infrastructure and amenities that appeal to both European expats and Spanish families. The area is characterized by its proximity to stunning Mediterranean beaches, world-class golf facilities, and excellent healthcare services. The international community is well-developed with English widely spoken, making it ideal for foreign buyers seeking integration without language barriers. Cox benefits from excellent road connections to Alicante city, while maintaining a relaxed, village-like atmosphere that preserves quality of life. The region's consistent +8% annual property appreciation reflects strong confidence in the area's future growth and appeal.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Golf: Several championship courses nearby including Bonalba Golf
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics with English-speaking doctors
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets, local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining scene from traditional tapas to international cuisine

propertyFeatures.intro: VEGABOL HOMES I Town Houses are constructed to the highest Spanish building standards with premium materials and modern finishes throughout. Each property features intelligent design maximizing natural light and ventilation, complemented by quality construction techniques that ensure durability and comfort. The developments incorporates sustainable building practices with thermal efficiency, contemporary aesthetics, and practical layouts ideal for families and investors. HANSEL LOKAL's attention to detail extends from structural elements to interior finishes, creating homes that exceed buyer expectations and maintain long-term value.

content.investmentSection: VEGABOL HOMES I represents an excellent investment opportunity in a market demonstrating consistent strength. Cox's property values have appreciated 8% year-on-year, outpacing many European markets while remaining 40% less expensive than comparable properties on Spanish islands. Rental income potential is substantial, with weekly vacation rentals averaging €800, generating attractive yields for buy-to-let investors. The established international community ensures steady demand for both long-term rentals and holiday lets. HANSEL LOKAL's reputation and June 2026 delivery timeline provide security and transparency. Whether purchasing for personal use or investment purposes, VEGABOL HOMES I offers compelling fundamentals in a region experiencing sustainable growth.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in VEGABOL HOMES I?
faqs.answer: Properties start from €223,000. VEGABOL HOMES I offers Town Houses with 2-3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, built size 81m², with only 2 units available. Contact us directly for current pricing and availability details via WhatsApp.

faqs.question: When will VEGABOL HOMES I be completed?
faqs.answer: Completion is scheduled for June 1st, 2026. HANSEL LOKAL provides a 10-year structural warranty with transparent development timelines. Contact us for specific delivery schedules and purchase conditions.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of VEGABOL HOMES I?
faqs.answer: HANSEL LOKAL is the developer, an established company with proven experience building quality homes throughout Cox and surrounding areas. They maintain excellent reputation for on-time delivery and quality construction standards.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Costa Blanca is an excellent property market. The region offers year-round sunshine, established international communities, quality healthcare, and consistent property appreciation of approximately 8% annually. Cox specifically combines authentic Spanish living with modern amenities and strong investment fundamentals.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain. There are minimal restrictions on foreign ownership. You'll need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and should consult with a Spanish legal advisor regarding your specific circumstances and any tax implications.

faqs.question: How far is VEGABOL HOMES I from the beach?
faqs.answer: VEGABOL HOMES I is within 20 minutes of multiple Blue Flag beaches. Cox benefits from proximity to some of Costa Blanca's most pristine Mediterranean coastlines, perfect for beach lovers and water sports enthusiasts.

faqs.question: What amenities are near VEGABOL HOMES I?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for shopping, a regional hospital within 30 minutes with English-speaking doctors, several championship golf courses nearby, and multiple restaurants and dining options. International schools with British curriculum are available in the region.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Primary costs include property price, transfer tax (6-8%), notary fees (1%), legal fees (1-2%), and potential real estate agent fees. Additional costs post-purchase include property taxes (around 0.4% annually) and community fees if applicable. VEGABOL HOMES I's reasonable starting price of €223,000 keeps overall investment costs accessible.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential of VEGABOL HOMES I?
faqs.answer: Weekly vacation rental rates in the area average €800, providing attractive yield potential for investors. The established tourism infrastructure and international community in Cox ensure consistent demand for both holiday and long-term rentals.

faqs.question: Do I need a visa to buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: No, purchasing property in Spain does not require a visa. However, residency status may affect tax obligations. British citizens and other non-EU nationals should consult legal advisors regarding visa and residency requirements if planning to live in the property long-term.

content.conclusion: VEGABOL HOMES I represents a rare opportunity to purchase premium Town Houses in Cox at exceptional value. With only 2 units available, prices from €223,000, and completion scheduled for June 2026, this HANSEL LOKAL development offers the perfect combination of modern living, strategic location, and investment potential. Whether you're seeking a Mediterranean home, investment property, or holiday retreat, VEGABOL HOMES I delivers outstanding value in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable locations. The established international community, proximity to pristine beaches, championship golf courses, and comprehensive amenities make Cox an ideal choice for discerning buyers. Don't miss this exclusive opportunity. Contact us today via WhatsApp for detailed information, availability, and personalized guidance through the purchasing process. Let VEGABOL HOMES I be your gateway to Costa Blanca living.
